name: before/after asteroid
description:
A reflection on change and separation, inspired by a personal experience I've had to weather for the last few months that's just boiled over. Submission for the Dinosaur Bitsy Jam.

If you liked this, feel free to give feedback or chat about it - I go by the same handle on Twitter.

Credits:

  • Bitsy Game Maker by Adam Le Doux
  • directional avatar hack by Sean LeBlanc
